add.long_documentation: Add a new OnPremise IP (only IPV4) address to this organization's draas offer

params.name: ip
params.description: Your OnPremise IP address to authorize to the DRaaS offer
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid IPv4 address. (E.g. 192.168.1.1 or 203.0.113.0).

list.long_documentation: List all OnPremise IPs allowed allowed for this organization's draas offer

model.documentation: List of OnPremise IPs for this organization's draas offer

remove.long_documentation: Remove an existing OnPremise IP address from this organization's draas offer

params.name: ip
params.description: Your OnPremise IP address to remove from the DRaaS offer
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid IPv4 address. (E.g. 192.168.1.1 or 203.0.113.0).

create.short_documentation: CreateEdgeGateway creates a new edge gateway
create.long_documentation: Create EdgeGateway performs a POST request to create a new edge gateway

params.name: owner_name
params.description: The name of the VDC or VDC Group that this edge gateway belongs to.

params.name: t0_name
params.description: The name of the T0 router that this edge gateway will be connected to. If not provided and only if one T0 router is available, the first T0 router will be used.
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid T0 name (pr01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

params.name: bandwidth
params.description: The bandwidth limit in Mbps for the edge gateway. If t0 is SHARED, it must be one of the available values for the T0 router (Default value:  5Mbps). If t0 is DEDICATED, unlimited bandwidth is allowed.

delete.long_documentation: Delete EdgeGateway performs a DELETE request to delete an edge gateway

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

get.long_documentation: Get EdgeGateway performs a GET request to retrieve an edge gateway

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid Edge Gateway name (tn01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

list.short_documentation: ListEdgeGateways retrieves a list of edge gateways
list.long_documentation: List EdgeGateways performs a GET request to retrieve a list of edge gateways

update.long_documentation: Update EdgeGateway performs a PUT request to update an edge gateway

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

params.name: bandwidth
params.description: The new bandwidth limit in Mbps for the edge gateway. If t0 is SHARED, it must be one of the available values for the T0 router (Default value: 5Mbps). If t0 is DEDICATED, unlimited bandwidth is allowed.

CloudavenueServices.markdown_documentation: Manage Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway. Cloudavenue services is a network setting that allows the EdgeGateway to connect to the mutualized Cloud Avenue services (DNS, DHCP, etc.).

disable.short_documentation: Disable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.
disable.long_documentation: Disable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway. Cloudavenue services is a network setting that allows the EdgeGateway to connect to the mutualized Cloud Avenue services (DNS, DHCP, etc.).

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

enable.short_documentation: Enable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.
enable.long_documentation: Enable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

get.short_documentation: Retrieve Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.
get.long_documentation: Retrieve Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway. This command returns the Cloud Avenue services available on the EdgeGateway, such as DNS, DHCP, and others.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

model.documentation: Unique identifier of the Cloud Avenue services configuration
Dedicated IPv4 used as NAT entrypoint for the services
Catalog of Cloud Avenue Service categories and their services
One or more IPv4 addresses used by the service
Fully qualified domain names for the service

create.long_documentation: This command allows you to create a new Public IP on the specified Edge Gateway.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid Edge Gateway name (tn01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

model.documentation: Unique identifier of the public IP
True if the public IP is advertised via BGP

delete.long_documentation: This command allows you to delete a Public IP in the Edge Gateway.

params.name: ip
params.description: The public IP address.
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid IPv4 address. (E.g. 192.168.1.1 or 203.0.113.0).

get.long_documentation: This command allows you to retrieve information about a Public IP in the Edge Gateway.

params.name: ip
params.description: The public IP address.
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid IPv4 address. (E.g. 192.168.1.1 or 203.0.113.0).

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid Edge Gateway name (tn01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

model.documentation: Unique identifier of the public IP
True if the public IP is advertised via BGP

list.long_documentation: This command allows you to list all Public IPs in the Edge Gateway.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid Edge Gateway name (tn01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

model.documentation: Unique identifier of the public IP
True if the public IP is advertised via BGP

get.short_documentation: Retrieve services information about a specific EdgeGateway.
get.long_documentation: Retrieve services information about a specific EdgeGateway. This command retrieves the network services available on the EdgeGateway, such as load balancers, public IPs, and Cloud Avenue services.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

model.documentation: Unique identifier of the edge gateway
Unique identifier of the load balancer
Service class (tier) applied to the load balancer
Maximum number of virtual services supported
List of allocated public IP addresses
Unique identifier of the Cloud Avenue services configuration
Dedicated IPv4 used as NAT entrypoint for the services
Catalog of Cloud Avenue Service categories and their services
One or more IPv4 addresses used by the service
Fully qualified domain names for the service

get.long_documentation: Retrieve detailed information about your organization.

model.documentation: URN of the organization in the format urn:vcloud:org:<UUID>
Indicates if the organization is enabled
Internet billing mode of the organization
Number of VDC(s) in your organization
Number of VM(s) in state power on
Number of user(s) in the organization
Number of standalone disk(s) configured in the organization

update.long_documentation: Update the details of an existing organization.

params.name: full_name
params.description: The full name of the organization. It's a long format of your organization name. Appears in the Cloud application as a human-readable name of the organization.
params.validators_description: Ensures that the input value does not exceed a maximum length of `129` characters.

params.name: description
params.description: A description for the organization.
params.example: This is my organization description to update
params.validators_description: Ensures that the input value does not exceed a maximum length of `257` characters.

params.name: email
params.description: The contact email for the organization.
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid email address. (e.g., `foo@bar.com`).

params.name: internet_billing_mode
params.description: The internet billing mode for the organization. More information about billing modes can be found in the [documentation](https://cloud.orange-business.com/en/offres/infrastructure-iaas/cloud-avenue/wiki-cloud-avenue/services/internet-access/).
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is one of: `PAYG`, `TRAFFIC_VOLUME`.

model.documentation: URN of the organization in the format urn:vcloud:org:<UUID>
Indicates if the organization is enabled
Internet billing mode of the organization
Number of VDC(s) in your organization
Number of VM(s) in state power on
Number of user(s) in the organization
Number of standalone disk(s) configured in the organization

get.short_documentation: Get a specific T0 by name.
get.long_documentation: Retrieve a specific T0 directly by its name or by the edge gateway it is associated with. This command allows you to fetch detailed information about a specific T0.

params.name: t0_name
params.description: The name of the T0 to retrieve.
params.validators_description: The value is required if one of the parameters `edgegateway_id`, `edgegateway_name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid T0 name (pr01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

params.name: edgegateway_id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if one of the parameters `t0_name`, `edgegateway_name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgegateway`)..

params.name: edgegateway_name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if one of the parameters `edgegateway_id`, `t0_name` is null.,

model.documentation: Class of service for the T0 router.
Total bandwidth capacity for the T0 router in Mbps. This is the maximum bandwidth that can be allocated to the T0 router. It is a limit imposed by the Class of Service.
Total bandwidth provisioned for the T0 router across all edge gateways in Mbps.
Remaining bandwidth that can be allocated to the edge gateways in Mbps. This is calculated as Capacity - Provisioned.
Allowed bandwidth values for the T0 router in Mbps. This is used to determine the available bandwidth options for the new edge gateway. If empty, no bandwidth remaining to allocate.
Indicates if unlimited bandwidth is allowed for the T0 router. This is true if the T0 router is DEDICATED.
Maximum number of edge gateways for the T0 router.
List of edge gateways associated with the T0 router.
Unique identifier of the edge gateway. It is a URN that uniquely identifies the edge gateway.
Bandwidth allocated to the edge gateway in Mbps.
Allowed bandwidth values for the edge gateway in Mbps.

list.short_documentation: List all T0s available in the organization.
list.long_documentation: List all T0s available in the organization. This command retrieves a list of all T0s, which are the top-level network services in the Edge Gateway architecture.

model.documentation: Class of service for the T0 router.
Total bandwidth capacity for the T0 router in Mbps. This is the maximum bandwidth that can be allocated to the T0 router. It is a limit imposed by the Class of Service.
Total bandwidth provisioned for the T0 router across all edge gateways in Mbps.
Remaining bandwidth that can be allocated to the edge gateways in Mbps. This is calculated as Capacity - Provisioned.
Allowed bandwidth values for the T0 router in Mbps. This is used to determine the available bandwidth options for the new edge gateway. If empty, no bandwidth remaining to allocate.
Indicates if unlimited bandwidth is allowed for the T0 router. This is true if the T0 router is DEDICATED.
Maximum number of edge gateways for the T0 router.
List of edge gateways associated with the T0 router.
Unique identifier of the edge gateway. It is a URN that uniquely identifies the edge gateway.
Bandwidth allocated to the edge gateway in Mbps.
Allowed bandwidth values for the edge gateway in Mbps.

create.long_documentation: Create a new Virtual Data Center (VDC) with the specified parameters.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the VDC to create
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid VDC name (<alphanumeric> with - _ character and with max length 27 and min length 2)..

params.name: description
params.description: Description of the VDC to create

params.name: service_class
params.description: Service class of the VDC to create
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is one of: `ECO`, `STD`, `HP`, `VOIP`.

params.name: disponibility_class
params.description: Disponibility class of the VDC to create
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is one of: `ONE-ROOM`, `DUAL-ROOM`, `HA-DUAL-ROOM`.

params.name: billing_model
params.description: Billing model of the VDC to create
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is one of: `PAYG`, `DRAAS`, `RESERVED`.

params.name: storage_billing_model
params.description: Storage billing model of the VDC to create
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is one of: `PAYG`, `RESERVED`.

params.name: vcpu
params.description: Number of vCPUs to allocate to the VDC.

params.name: memory
params.description: Amount of memory (in GB) to allocate to the VDC.

params.name: storage_profiles
params.description: List of storage profiles to create within the specified VDC

params.name: class
params.description: Storage class for the profile. Supports predefined and dedicated storage classes (see rules for available options)

params.name: limit
params.description: Storage capacity limit in GiB (maximum amount of storage available to the VDC)
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is between `100` and `81920`.

params.name: default
params.description: Designates this storage profile as the default for the VDC when no specific profile is specified

model.documentation: Maximum number of vCPUs that can be allocated in the VDC (CPU quota).
Current number of vCPUs allocated in the VDC
Frequency of all VCPUs in MHz
Used frequency of all VCPUs in MHz
Frequency of a single VCPU in MHz
Storage profiles available in the VDC
Class name of the storage profile
Billing model of the VDC compute
Billing model of the VDC storage
Number of VMs in the VDC
Number of running VMs in the VDC
Number of deployed VApps in the VDC
Number of storage profiles in the VDC
Number of disks in the VDC

rules.description: Disponibility class allowed for Service Class ECO
Disponibility class allowed for Service Class ECO

rules.whenHuman: (service_class = STD OR service_class = HP OR service_class = VOIP)
rules.description: Disponibility class allowed for Service Class STD, HP, VOIP
Billing model allowed for Service Class ECO, STD
Billing model allowed for Service Class HP
Billing model allowed for Service Class VOIP
Storage billing model allowed for Service Class ECO
VCPU allowed for Service Class ECO with PAYG or DRAAS billing model
VCPU allowed for Service Class ECO with RESERVED billing model
Storage profile class allowed for Disponibility Class ONE-ROOM
Storage profile class allowed for Disponibility Class DUAL-ROOM
Storage profile class allowed for Disponibility Class HA-DUAL-ROOM

params.description: ID of the VDC to delete
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the VDC to delete
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid VDC name (<alphanumeric> with - _ character and with max length 27 and min length 2)..

params.description: Name of the VDC to get
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid VDC name (<alphanumeric> with - _ character and with max length 27 and min length 2)..

params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the VDC to get
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null., Validates that the value is a valid VDC name (<alphanumeric> with - _ character and with max length 27 and min length 2)..

params.name: vcpu
params.description: The number of virtual CPUs for the VDC.

params.name: memory

Current number of vCPUs allocated in the VDC

VCPU allowed for Service Class ECO with RESERVED billing model

add.long_documentation: Creates one or more storage profiles within a specified VDC. Each profile requires a storage class and capacity limit, with an optional default designation.

params.name: vdc_id
params.description: Unique identifier of the target VDC for the new storage profile
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `vdc_name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: vdc_name
params.description: Name of the target VDC for the new storage profile
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `vdc_id` is null.,

params.name: storage_profiles
params.description: List of storage profiles to create within the specified VDC

params.name: class
params.description: Storage class for the profile. Supports predefined and dedicated storage classes (see rules for available options)

params.name: limit
params.description: Storage capacity limit in GiB (maximum amount of storage available to the VDC)
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is between `100` and `81920`.

params.name: default
params.description: Designates this storage profile as the default for the VDC when no specific profile is specified

rules.description: Storage profile class allowed for Disponibility Class ONE-ROOM
Storage profile class allowed for Disponibility Class DUAL-ROOM
Storage profile class allowed for Disponibility Class HA-DUAL-ROOM

delete.long_documentation: Removes a storage profile from the specified VDC. Deletion is restricted for default profiles, the last remaining profile, or profiles currently in use.

params.name: vdc_id
params.description: Unique identifier of the VDC containing the storage profile to remove
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `vdc_name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: vdc_name
params.description: Name of the VDC containing the storage profile to remove
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `vdc_id` is null.,

params.name: storage_profiles
params.description: List of storage profiles to create within the specified VDC

params.name: class
params.description: Storage class for the profile. Supports predefined and dedicated storage classes (see rules for available options)

list.long_documentation: Retrieves a comprehensive list of storage profiles. When no filters are specified, all storage profiles across all VDCs are returned. Filtering options include storage profile ID/name and VDC ID/name. Filters can be combined (e.g., profile filter + VDC filter). When both ID and name are provided for the same resource, they must reference the same object to return results.

params.name: id
params.description: Unique identifier of the storage profile to retrieve
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdcstorageProfile`)..

params.name: vdc_id
params.description: Unique identifier of the VDC containing the storage profiles
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: vdc_name
params.description: Name of the VDC containing the storage profiles

params.name: class
params.description: Storage class name of the profile to retrieve

model.documentation: List of VDCs to list storage profiles for
List of storage profiles in the VDC
Limit of the storage profile in GiB
Used storage of the storage profile in GiB
Indicates if the storage profile is the default one

update.long_documentation: Modifies one or more storage profiles within a VDC. Supported updates include capacity limits and default profile designation. Storage class names cannot be modified.

params.name: vdc_id
params.description: Unique identifier of the VDC containing the storage profile to modify
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `vdc_name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: vdc_name
params.description: Name of the VDC containing the storage profile to modify
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `vdc_id` is null.,

params.name: storage_profiles
params.description: List of storage profiles to create within the specified VDC

params.name: class
params.description: Storage class for the profile. Supports predefined and dedicated storage classes (see rules for available options)

params.name: limit
params.description: Storage capacity limit in GiB (maximum amount of storage available to the VDC)
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is between `100` and `81920`.

params.name: default
params.description: Designates this storage profile as the default for the VDC when no specific profile is specified

model.documentation: List of storage profiles in the VDC
Limit of the storage profile in GiB
Used storage of the storage profile in GiB
Indicates if the storage profile is the default one

VdcGroup.documentation: This command allows you to manage VDC Groups.

create.long_documentation: Create a new Virtual Data Center Group (Vdc Group) in your organization.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the Vdc Group

params.name: description
params.description: Description of the Vdc Group

params.name: vdcs
params.description: List of Vdc to remove from the Vdc Group

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the Vdc to remove
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdc`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the Vdc to remove
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

model.documentation: Number of Vdcs in the Vdc Group
List of Vdcs in the Vdc Group

delete.long_documentation: Delete an existing Virtual Data Center Group (Vdc Group) from your organization.

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the Vdc Group
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdcGroup`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the Vdc Group
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

params.name: force
params.description: Force delete the Vdc Group. Value `true` means to forcefully delete the object that contains other objects even if those objects are in a state that does not allow removal. The default is `false` therefore, objects are not removed if they are not in a state that normally allows removal. Force also implies recursive delete where other contained objects are removed. Errors may be ignored. Invalid value (not true or false) are ignored. The VDC contains in the Vdc Group are not deleted.

get.long_documentation: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Vdc Group by its ID or name. This command returns all attributes and configuration details of the selected Vdc Group, helping you understand its current state and associated resources.

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the Vdc Group to filter by
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdcGroup`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the Vdc Group to filter by
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

model.documentation: Number of Vdcs in the Vdc Group
List of Vdcs in the Vdc Group

list.long_documentation: List all Virtual Data Center Groups (Vdc Groups) available in your organization. If no filters are applied, it returns all Vdc Groups.

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the Vdc Group to filter by
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdcGroup`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the Vdc Group to filter by

model.documentation: Number of Vdcs in the Vdc Group
List of Vdcs in the Vdc Group

update.long_documentation: Update an existing Virtual Data Center Group (Vdc Group) in your organization. You can modify attributes such as the name, description, and associated Vdcs. To add or remove Vdcs, use the dedicated commands. If you want to modify the Vdcs associated with the Vdc Group, refer all the Vdcs you want to have associated with the Vdc Group in the `vdcs` parameter. Vdcs not present in this list will be removed from the Vdc Group.

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the Vdc Group
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`vdcGroup`)..

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the Vdc Group
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `id` is null.,

params.name: description
params.description: Description of the Vdc Group

params.name: vdcs
params.description: List of Vdc to remove from the Vdc Group
